subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=しょう<せう
|kanon=しょう<せう
|kanyoon=しゅう<しう
|kun=くわ-<くは-, すき-
|nanori=
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|豊%鍬入%姫%命|^とよ%すき.いり%ひめ の% ^みこと}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja}} {{wp|Hoe (tool)}}
{{ja-kanjitab|くわ|yomi=kun}} {{IPAchar|/kupa/}} → {{IPAchar|/kufa/}} → {{IPAchar|/kuwa/}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=くわ|-}}. Ultimate derivation {{unk|ja|nocap=1|sort=くわ}}. Possibly derived from {{m|ja|食う|tr=kuu||to [[eat up]]; to [[bite]] into}}, which has a {{m|ja|未然形|tr=mizenkei||incomplete form}} of ''kuwa''.

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: In compounds, this term may refer more broadly to similarly shaped tools for working the earth, such as a [[plough]] or a [[harrow]].

subSections.title: Derived terms
Idioms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|鍬を入れる|くわ を いれる}}
* {{ja-r|鍬を抜かす|くわ を ぬかす}}

subSections.title: Proverbs
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|縁の下の鍬使い|えん の した の くわ-づかい}}
